articles.title: SPA Chairman Meets New Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
SPA Chairman Meets New Lao Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly Choe Thae Bok met and had a talk with new Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Serbian President on Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Serbian President on Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Serbia, a country that succeeded Yugoslavia, is of the stand to value the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the DPRK and further develop them in various fields including politics and economy.
					Serbian President Boris Tadzic said this when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to Serbia Kim Son Gyong on February 21.
					
					He hoped that everything would go well in the DPRK.

articles.title: Music Director of Seoul Municipal Orchestra Here
articles.content:
Music Director of Seoul Municipal Orchestra Here
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Jong Myong Hun, music director of the Seoul Municipal Orchestra who is also music director of the Radio Philharmonic Orchestra of France, and his party arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Yemen
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Yemen
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message to Abd Rabbuh Mansur Al Hadi to congratulate him on his election as president of Yemen. 
					Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Yemen would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president success in his responsible work for the country's stability and development.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Cote d'Ivoire
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message to President of Cote d'Ivoire Alassane Ouattara to congratulate him on the successful conclusion of the 40th summit of the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) and his election as Chairman of ECOWAS.
					Kim in the message praised the concerted efforts made by the member nations of ECOWAS to achieve the regional security and common development.
					
					Reaffirming the DPRK government's stand to constantly develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations with West African countries, Kim sincerely hoped that the ECOWAS would make greater success in its work by his positive efforts.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to ECOWAS Commission President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to ECOWAS Commission President
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a congratulatory message to Kadre Desire Ouedraogo on his election as president of the 40th Economic Community of West African States Commission. 
					The message wished him success in his work for the regional stability and development and unity of the member nations of ECOWAS.

articles.title: Koreans Recall History of WPK Conferences
articles.content:
Koreans Recall History of WPK Conferences
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the decision of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea on holding a Party conference in April, Korean people recall the history of the past conferences, which were held to settle the urgent problems of the times.
					The Party conference in March 1958 reviewed the work of wiping out those engaged in factional tricks within the Party and thus marked a milestone in strengthening the unity and cohesion of the Party.
					
					Another Party conference in October 1966 took measures to reorganize the overall work for socialist construction and step up the defence building under the situation in which the imperialists were intensifying the anti-socialist moves.
					
					The Party conference in 2010, too, was convened to meet the demand of the developing revolution.
					
					Decades had passed since the Sixth Congress of the WPK in Oct. 1980. In those days the invincibility of the DPRK and the superiority and might of Juche-based socialism were strikingly demonstrated under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					The WPK guided the army and people under the banner of Songun as required by the prevailing situation to victoriously conclude the arduous march, the forced march and laid a solid foundation for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					Great successes were made in all domains including political, military, economic and cultural fields through a fresh revolutionary surge.
					
					After all, the Party conference took place in 2010 to further strengthen the WPK and enhance its leadership role in keeping with the fresh circumstances and thus glorify the victorious history of the Korean revolution. 
					
					The forthcoming conference will be conducive to glorifying the sacred career and undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun, closely rallied around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Closes
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Paektusan Prize closed with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Tuesday. The contest was opened on Feb. 10 in the run-up to the Day of the Shining Star.
					Men and women players of the April 25 Sports Group came first in basketball and volleyball events. 
					
					Men's players of the Ryongnamsan Sports Group and women's players of the April 25 Sports Group emerged winners in the hand ball matches while men's players of the April 25 Sports Group and women's players of the Rimyongsu Sports Group came first in the group table tennis event. 
					
					Present at the ceremony were officials concerned and sportspersons. 
					
					Pak Myong Chol, minister of the Physical Culture and Sports, made a closing address.

articles.title: Sowing of Spring Wheat and Barley Seeds Starts in DPRK
articles.content:
Sowing of Spring Wheat and Barley Seeds Starts in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Sowing of spring wheat and barley seeds started on farms in the DPRK.
					Officials of the Ministry of Agriculture and agricultural guidance institutions at all levels are working in an organized manner to ensure the highest yielding from the first crops.
					
					The sowing is being promoted as scheduled thanks to the efforts of officials and farmers. They started the sowing in the right season after making full preparations including acquisition of seeds of good strains, selection of the right soil for double cropping and repair of farm machines.
					
					Pyongyang has concentrated efforts under the plan to increase the areas under wheat and barley 1.2 times as against last year.
					
					Agricultural workers in Raknang, Sadong and Ryokpho Districts and Kangnam County are making an effective use of machines.
					
					Jungsan County in South Phyongan Province has finished sowing in more than 100 hectares in a few days, coming first in the province.
					
					Fields, in which sowing has been done, are on the increase on farms in Sariwon City and Pongsan and Suan counties, North Hwanghae Province. 
					
					Agricultural workers in South Hwanghae Province have already done 30 percent of sowing while those in Nampho City are expanding the achievements. 
					
					Farms including North Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces also started sowing seeds in the thawed land.

articles.title: New Lubricant Additive Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Lubricant Additive Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Central Mining Research Institute of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently made a new additive to improve the quality of lubricants.
					Its researchers succeeded in getting products of second-stage processing with high degree of purity from natural minerals and developed ultrafine grinding technology on this basis.
					
					They also settled problems arising in establishing the standardization of product and technologies for its quality assurance and application, thus making the additive a high-tech product suited to international quality standard index in terms of purity degree and particle size.
					
					For its high effectiveness this lubricant additive makes it possible to prolong the serviceable life of bearings twice and the replacement cycle of lubricants thrice.
					
					It has already been introduced in various economic units of the country.

articles.title: Noodle Served in Flat Vessel, Originated in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Noodle Served in Flat Vessel, Originated in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Noodle served in a flat vessel is a traditional Korean dish, which was originated in Pyongyang.
					A staff of the Korean Association of Cooks, Jo Ui Yong, told KCNA about the dish:
					
					The dish mainly includes boiled beef and buckwheat noodle.
					
					On the first hand, sliced beef is seasoned in a proper way.
					
					The seasoned meat is put on a brass flat vessel, along with boiled eggs, peeled pears and sliced cucumber, decorated with thread-like egg, onion and red pepper.
					
					Then, it is taken with coils of buckwheat noodle mixed with beef soup, pickled vegetable and seasoning, which are served respectively on each bowl.
					
					It is said that the dish reflects the open-hearted character of Pyongyang natives.
					
					The dish, believed to be one of cuisines peculiar to Phyongan Province, is popular among not only Koreans but foreigners.

articles.title: Collection of Writings "May Country of General Kim Jong Il Shine" (10) Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Collection of Writings "May Country of General Kim Jong Il Shine" (10) Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Collection of writings by schoolchildren "May Country of General Kim Jong Il Shine" (10) was brought out in the DPRK. 
					The book contains more than 390 children's songs and poems, words of songs, lyric poems, essays, occasional notes, etc. created by a hundred students illustrated with their photos. 
					
					Among them are children's poem "Gravel Stones at Phophyong Ferry," occasional note "Sea of Flowers," lyric poem "On Ryonggun Peak," words of song "Birthplace in February," essay "Jeep and Tour Car" and children's song "We Plant Flowers at Birthplace in Hoeryong." 
					
					They highly praise the feats performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu who showed all sorts of loving care for younger generations. 
					
					They express ardent yearning for the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who made forced marches of super-intensity for building a thriving nation and bringing happiness to the posterity, holding high the banner of Songun. 
					
					They make a truthful portrayal of the schoolchildren growing to be heirs to the revolution and pillars of Songun Korea and the stirring reality of the country. 
					
					The book also contains notes and comments and experience of writers and teachers of literature.

articles.title: KCNA on U.S. Criminal Scenario for Its Strengthening Military Domination
articles.content:
KCNA on U.S. Criminal Scenario for Its Strengthening Military Domination
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is making desperate efforts to establish its military domination over the Asia-Pacific region.
					The U.S. is contemplating dispersing its marines concentrated in Okinawa, Japan and deploying them in various countries in the region.
					
					It disclosed its policy for dispatching its forces to different places in a secret rotating manner. Australia has already seconded it.
					
					The U.S. is negotiating with Philippines on the issue. The U.S. laid down an orientation of dispersing and deploying U.S. marines in Okinawa in the Asia-Pacific region in a joint document agreed with Japan recently.
					
					This reveals the criminal scenario of the U.S. to contain potential rivals and maintain and strengthen its military domination over the region by ensuring the "strategic flexibility" of its forces deployed in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity. 
					
					The relocation of the U.S. marines is not only the transfer of aggressor forces in accordance with the new military strategy of the present U.S. administration but their forward-deployment for starting a new war.
					
					After shifting the centre for carrying out the strategy for world domination to the Asia-Pacific region in the new defence strategy in January this year, the U.S. is busy concentrating its forces in the region in the wake of its reduction of its forces in Mideast and Europe. It is stepping up the dispersal and deployment of its marines, in particular.
					
					The aim of the U.S. is to make an effective and proactive use of its forces for aggression in countries of the region by increasing its maneuverability, flexibility and deployment speed.
					
					The transfer of U.S. marines is an extremely dangerous military move to fan up the atmosphere of a Cold War in the region and go unchallenged in the region.
					
					What should not be overlooked is that south Korea is not exception in the above-said strategy.
					
					This can be illustrated by the widespread world public opinion that "a proposal for relocating some of U.S. marines in south Korea is now under examination" and "Lee Myung Bak had already okayed it" and so forth.
					
					As a matter of fact, the U.S. has markedly increased the number of joint military exercises with the south Korean puppet army, and their intensity since the announcement of the new defence strategy.
					
					U.S. marines and the south Korean puppet marine corps are set to stage the largest-ever joint landing drill and field maneuvers in the waters around the five islands, the biggest hotspot in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					This goes to prove that U.S. marines may be deployed in south Korea any time.
					
					In case the forward-deployment of U.S. marines in south Korea in addition to the huge aggressor forces present there becomes a reality, it is bound to further strain the situation on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					The U.S. is the arch criminal escalating the tension in the peninsula and the rest of Asia-Pacific.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Saber-rattling
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are staging large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises together with the U.S. imperialists, driving the situation to the brink of war. This is a premeditated criminal saber-rattling to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north at any cost.
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a bylined commentary.
					
					Key Resolve and Foal Eagle which involve huge forces and latest war equipment enough to wage a war are turning the whole of south Korea into war drill grounds, increasing the danger of a new war, nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The conspiratorial "Cheonan" warship sinking case was cooked up in the wake of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle two years ago. No one can vouch that similar shocking case would not be re-orchestrated.
					
					The group of traitors trying hard to invent a pretext for igniting a war against the DPRK is claiming that they are "annual defensive drills." But no one would believe this.
					
					The DPRK has already admonished the group in an understandable manner and showed its retaliatory strike in practice. Nevertheless the group made a de facto declaration of a war against the DPRK, failing to come to its senses. What remains to be done by the DPRK is a practical action to sweep away from this land the Lee Myung Bak group and warmongers at home and abroad by its own-style war method and powerful striking means.
					
					The DPRK has never made an empty talk.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on U.S. New National Defense Strategy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on U.S. New National Defense Strategy
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The United States made public a report on a new national defense strategy recently. It envisages a drastic reduction of military spending for ten years, the transfer of U.S. forces in EU and Mideast to the Asia-Pacific region and replacement of its previous military strategy which calls for waging two wars simultaneously by a strategy for carrying out a single war. It also calls for implementing the plan for dispatching more than 690 000 U.S. reinforcements to the Korean Peninsula in "contingency", pursuant to the "OPLAN 5027".
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					The U.S. new national defense strategy is, in essence, aimed at gratifying its unlimited ambition to dominate the world through aggression and war.
					
					The report, worked out in a more crafty way in its form and contents, is no more than a policy for showdown as it seeks domination and subjugation, aggression and war. It is also the most reactionary and dangerous document for the declaration of a war.
					
					The reactionary nature and danger of the report lie in that it was laid down as a policy to steadily maintain and strengthen a nuclear strategy as a key lever for dominating the world and the Asia-Pacific region was designated as a center for overseas military operations.
					
					The U.S. has sustained its repeated failures in its moves for building a unipolar world but it is set to do so by means of nuclear weapons. "Provocation", deterrence and the like on its lips are no more than chicanery to beef up nuclear forces for aggression.
					
					What is the biggest danger of the report is that the U.S. intends to ignite the second Korean war, a nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					It is the U.S. strategic scenario that it will put the whole of Korea under its control at any cost in a bid to put Asia under its domination and only when it seizes the whole of Korea is it possible to carry out its Asian strategy and, furthermore, world strategy with ease.
					
					The U.S. imperialists stake the destiny of the Asia-Pacific strategy on putting the peninsula under their control. That is why they are keen to invade the DPRK by force of arms and occupy the whole of Korea and, furthermore, dominate Asia and the world.
					
					If a nuclear war breaks out on the peninsula, it will quickly spill over to other countries.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Unification Minister’s Outbursts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails S. Korean Unification Minister’s Outbursts
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Ryu U Ik, minister of Unification of south Korea, was recently reported to have absurdly grumbled that "it was mud-slinging," "it was not helpful" and "it was a violation". He went so foolish as to assert that the north refused to respond to the south side's proposal and "it was pity and regrettable". 
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: These are shameless remarks to shift the blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations upon the north and a crafty artifice to justify their policy of confrontation and true colors as anti-reunification elements. 
					
					With neither double-dealing tactics nor jugglery can the south Korean authorities cover their despicable true colors as saboteur of inter-Korean dialogue and disturber of humanitarian undertakings, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					Resentment is mounting among south Koreans from all walks of life against the conservative group who drove the north-south relations into catastrophe and escalated the confrontation. 
					
					Much upset by this, the Lee Myung Bak group pretends to be interested in the improved inter-Korean relations, while finding fault with the DPRK. This is nothing but a desperate bid to cover up their true colors as confrontation maniacs.
					
					This is, however, futile last-ditch effort. The fate of the group is so miserable that it has already been put on the downhill due to the failure of its confrontation policy. 
					
					The south Korean authorities have committed too many crimes to save themselves from the fate already sealed with any rhetoric.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Group's Call for "Dialogue" Sophism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Group's Call for "Dialogue" Sophism
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities' recent call for "dialogue" and "contacts" with the DPRK is no more than cosmetic to cover up their true colors as a chieftain who has spoiled the north-south relations and escalated confrontation and the tensions.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					The touch-and-go situation now prevails in the Korean Peninsula due to the south Korean authorities' warmongering military drills, says the article, adding:
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group's call for "dialogue" is just sophism to hide its attempt to invade the DPRK.
					
					The war drills amount to a provocation that chills the atmosphere of dialogue.
					
					It is prerequisite for having a dialogue to create sound atmosphere. Only stable atmosphere guarantees smooth dialogue.
					
					"Dialogue" is not a word becoming to the south Korean authorities as they are staging high-stake war exercises.
					
					Short while ago, the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission in an open questionnaire urged the south Korean authorities to end their hostile acts against the DPRK and create an atmosphere if they honestly intend to enter into dialogue and mend the fence with the DPRK.
					
					But the Lee Myung Bak group responded to the DPRK's proposal with large-scale war drills, an evident military provocation to it and an indication of its plan to invade the DPRK.
					
					All the facts give the lie to the group's call for "dialogue".

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Call for "Dialogue" Dismissed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Call for "Dialogue" Dismissed Hypocritical
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) ? South Korea’s Lee Myung Bak at a special press conference on Feb. 22 said "if the north wants to have a dialogue, the south will welcome it with an open mind", while talking about "sincere approach".
					Earlier, the minister of Unification and other servants of the traitor vied with each other to call for "exploring the way for dialogue" while saying they "expect the north to come out for the dialogue".
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group's claim that it is open to "dialogue" is no more than sophism to evade the people's blame laid on it for having frozen the north-south relations, and cover up its anti-reunification and confrontational nature.
					
					The group's evermore frantic anti-DPRK confrontation racket reveals the deceptive nature of its much-touted "resumption of dialogue".
					
					The group also makes provocative remarks that "there is no change in the keynote of the policy toward north" and "it will play a leading role with a main emphasis on the core of the policy toward north".
					
					It holds the DPRK accountable for the "Cheonan" warship sinking case whose conspiratorial nature had already been brought to light, while talking about someone's "provocation", "change" and "option".
					
					The group speaks loudly in public of improving inter-Korean relations while calling for the "resumption of dialogue". But it can never shirk its responsibility for having plunged the relations into complete deadlock unless it makes a fundamental change in its policy of confrontation and wipe out the anti-reunification forces.

articles.title: Repeal of Hostile Policy toward DPRK Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of Hostile Policy toward DPRK Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in an editorial on Feb. 25 called on the authorities to repeal their hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					The south side should not disturb peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, the paper said.
					
					The authorities should boldly pull down such barriers standing in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations as "May 24 measure" and drastically change the framework of the "policy toward the north."

articles.title: Stop to Naval Base Construction Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Naval Base Construction Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea sent a letter of protest to the prime minister on Feb. 25 calling for stopping the naval base construction on Jeju Island.
					After Lee Myung Bak clarified his stand to hasten the Jeju naval base construction at a special press conference on the 4th year of his office, the ministry of defense, the navy and the police have pressed for the construction, the letter said.
					
					The authorities' push for the construction despite the unanimous opposition of the people would only bring terrible results, it said.
					
					The construction of the base will pollute the natural environment and threaten the peace of Northeast Asia, leaving only pains in the hearts of the islanders, it added.
					
					The letter accused the authorities of raising groundless reasons to convince the public of the necessity of the naval base, and urged them to stop the construction with immediate effect, though belatedly.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Will Live Forever with Immortal Flower: Foreigners and Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Will Live Forever with Immortal Flower: Foreigner and Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans expressed their admiration at Kimjongilias that were in full bloom at the venue of the 16th Kimjongilia Festival.
					Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					Seeing the flowers, I was deeply impressed by the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Kim Jong Il provided a sure guarantee for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					The Korean people are upholding the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Kim Jong Un is a man of inspiration for us.
					
					We will follow the road of Juche led by Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ro Mu Hyon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, said:
					
					While looking round the venue of the festival, I became stronger in my yearning for Kim Jong Il.
					
					Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the country and the people. The visits helped me to realize what a great man we had been led by.
					
					The flower of the sun will be in full bloom in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind.
					
					Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said that Kimjongilia reflects the reverence for Kim Jong Il of the people in the motherland and overseas and world progressive people.
					
					Kim Jong Il, a peerlessly great man, will live forever along with the immortal flower, he noted.

articles.title: Koreans in China Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
articles.content:
Koreans in China Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China Monday made public a statement "We resolutely oppose large-scale exercises for a war against the DPRK being staged by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers."
					It accused the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who went ahead with the DPRK-targeted Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises together with the U.S. imperialists despite strong domestic and foreign rebuff and denunciation.
					
					The General Association of Koreans in China vehemently condemns with mounting national resentment the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the DPRK to bring it down by force of arms despite unanimous opposition of Koreans, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The on-going military drills are unpardonable war hysteria kicked up by the hooligans by availing themselves of the mourning period in the DPRK and an intolerable infringement on its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and the puppet group are an arch criminal who has disturbed the process of the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula. They have made nuclear blackmail against the DPRK after shipping all types of nuclear strike means to south Korea and areas around it under the pretext of joint military drills.
					
					They should behave themselves, thinking twice about the grave consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK war moves, and stop at once the reckless war exercises for aggression against it.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by British Organization
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by British Organization
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A British organization posted on its internet homepage a special write-up on February 13 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article titled "Poem of Shining Star" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo of him and Kim Jong Un standing together.
					
					The article noted all the Korean people and the world progressives are looking back with deep emotion on the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence.
					
					It recalled that ever-growing voices praising Kim Jong Il are heard from among south Korean people and world progressives and the Day of the Shining Star is being commemorated with splendor worldwide.
					
					The history of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary activities and undying feats performed by him will shine forever and he will be always alive in the hearts of humankind as the sun, it said.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Seminars, book and photo exhibitions, film shows and remembrance meetings were held in Russia, Cuba, Nepal, India, Italy and Ethiopia between February 13 and 17.
					
					On display in the venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the photos of their undying feats and the books and photos of the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation and realize national reunification.
					
					Films shown included "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					The chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party said the world progressives joined the Korean people commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as his feats were great.
					
					Marco Rizzo, general secretary of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, said the Korean people could dynamically advance displaying the advantages of socialism centered on the popular masses as they were led by the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, said Kim Jong Il was a political elder who remarkably boosted the international prestige of the DPRK and set for all the countries around the world an example of how to fight for independence.
					
					Messages to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at seminars in Nepal and India.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was published in booklet by a Bangladeshi publishing house in Dhaka.
					The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with President Kim Il Sung's undying feats for national reunification.
					
					It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for the great unity of the entire nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by him as the three charters for national reunification. It also indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing national reunification on the basis of the charters.
					
					A book releasing ceremony took place on February 14.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups illustrated with the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il on his birth anniversary.
					The Mongolian paper Zuuny Medee on Feb. 15 in an article titled "The DPRK is commemorating the birth anniversary of the great leader" noted the world community is praising Kim Jong Il as a prominent great man.
					
					The paper in an article subtitled "HE Kim Jong Il is the great leader" noted under his wise guidance the DPRK emerged a satellite producer and launcher and ranked itself among nuclear weapons states, registering world-startling achievements, holding high the torch of industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					He made sure that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted, opening a bright prospect of national reunification, and dynamically pushed forward global independence.
					
					The paper in an article subtitled "HE Kim Jong Il was a benevolent father of the people" said history does not know such great man as Kim Jong Il who dedicated all his life to the people.
					
					The Malaysian paper Guang Ming Daily on Feb. 15 carried a special write-up illustrated with the photos of Kimjongilia and the birthplace of Kim Jong Il in the Paektusan secret camp.
					
					A Romanian paper on Feb. 16 in an article titled "In memory of HE Kim Jong Il" referred in detail to the fact that the Korean people were overcome with irrepressible sorrow and grief over his demise.
					
					The Egyptian paper Al Ahrar on Feb. 14 edited articles "Through extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities", "By original political mode of Songun," etc.
					
					The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional on Feb. 15 noted the core of Kim Jong Il's personality was his love for the people, telling legend-like stories associated with his journeys for field guidance.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" was brought out in pamphlet by the Perfect Publishing House of Ethiopia on February 21.
					The work, published on Sept. 7, Juche 70 (1981), clarifies that upholding independence in the party and state activities meets the requirements of the present era and the Juche idea serves as a man-centred philosophy.

articles.title: Swedish Figure Denounces U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Swedish Figure Denounces U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on Feb. 22 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for their reckless moves for aggression against the DPRK.
					He branded the live-fire artillery drills staged by the south Korean war-like forces on the five islands in the West Sea of Korea as a serious military provocation against the DPRK.
					
					The military exercises planned by the U.S. and south Korea would further escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula, he noted, adding:
					
					The live-shell exercises staged by the south Korean puppets and the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises prove once again that they do not want the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association strongly denounces the reckless military provocation of the U.S. and the south Korean puppets as a challenge to the peace of the DPRK and its surrounding areas.

articles.title: U.S. Arms Build-up under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Arms Build-up under Fire
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the U.S. and Japan agreed to transfer U.S. marines in Okinawa to Guam before the relocation of the Futenma U.S. air force base within the prefecture.
					The U.S. also announced that it would disperse and deploy its marines in Australia, Philippines and other parts of the Asia-Pacific region in a rotating manner.
					
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					This brings into bolder relief the U.S. hegemonic ambition to dominate the Asia-Pacific region by force of arms.
					
					The main slogan put up by the U.S. for carrying out its strategy for world domination is "put Asia-Pacific region under control in order to dominate the world." 
					
					There are countries in the region capable of upsetting overnight the unipolar world structure led by the U.S. dominating the present world. They have political, economic and military capabilities to be reckoned with.
					
					Given this fact, it is the most pressing and vital requirement of the U.S. to completely contain those countries capable of challenging its strategy for dominating the world and put the Asia-Pacific region under its control.
					
					The U.S. strategy for dominating the region is, in essence, a strategy for dominating Northeast Asia and the one for military domination.
					
					The moves to bolster the combat capability of the U.S. forces in the region may spark off an arms race and escalate the tension in the region as there are the most acute hotspots and it is beset with sensitive territorial issues among countries in the region.
					
					These moves are nothing but dangerous and reckless military actions which may trigger off a war in the region and seriously disturb social stability.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to clearly bear in mind the serious consequences to be entailed by its moves and stop them at once.

articles.title: Russian PM Rejects "Export of Democracy"
articles.content:
Russian PM Rejects "Export of Democracy"
Moscow, February 27 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin in a recent talk with commanding officers of the army clarified the stand of rejecting "export of democracy".
					The "orange revolution" will produce only abnormal phenomena and their consequences are miserable and negative, he said, adding the democratic development in Russia is barring the spread of the "orange revolution" to the country.
					
					Russia should defend its sovereignty and disallow anyone to interfere in its internal affairs and in this sense the army should act as a guardian of sovereignty, he stressed.
					
					Democracy cannot be exported but should be cultivated in the soil of the country, he noted.

articles.title: China Boosts Friendship with Africa
articles.content:
China Boosts Friendship with Africa
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- China has recently beefed up cooperation with Africa.
					African Union (AU) Conference Center and office complex were built in Addis Ababa with the help of the Chinese government. It was inaugurated in late January.
					
					This made it possible for AU to have its own headquarters building as a major regional body after the lapse of 48 years since its foundation.
					
					In the new century the bilateral ties have actively expanded in various fields including politics, economy, trade and culture with the establishment of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation (FOCAC) as a momentum.
					
					The economic and commercial relations have markedly developed, in particular.
					
					The bilateral trade increased to 114 billion U.S. dollars in 2010 from 10.6 billion U.S. dollars in 2000. Last year it hit 160 billion U.S. dollars. 
					
					The Chinese government opened China's markets to African goods duty-free, thus helping promote the bilateral trade.
					
					The African countries' exports to China have increased. For instance, 70 percent of Africa's total oil exports find their way to China.
					
					China has also made active investments in African countries so that they can enhance their own potentials for economic development.
					
					China's cooperation spurring the development of Africa is being supported as a positive one conducive to the world peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Jordan's Islamic Organization Condemn Koran Burning at U.S. Base in Afghanistan
articles.content:
Jordan's Islamic Organization Condemns Koran Burning at U.S. Base in Afghanistan
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Jordan's Muslim Brotherhood on Saturday condemned the burning of copies of the Koran at an U.S.-run military base in Afghanistan.
					In a statement on its website, the Islamic movement labeled the act as a crusade war against Muslims, holding the U.S. government accountable for this behavior.
					
					The Islamic movement said an apology by U.S. President Barack Obama over the Koran burning is not enough, demanding that those who burnt the Koran copies be sent to the International Criminal Court.

articles.title: American Society Staggering due to Ever-widening Gap between Rich and Poor
articles.content:
American Society Staggering due to Ever-widening Gap between Rich and Poor
Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Social contradictions are festering with each passing day due to the ever-widening gap between the rich and the poor in the United States apt to chant slogans "welfare for all" and "equality for all." This is deepening its crisis.
					The privileged circle which accounts for just one percent of the population has about 40 percent of wealth in its possession, leading a dissipated life, while the popular masses, the majority of population, live below the poverty line. 
					
					In 2010, 2.6 million people joined the ranks of the poor in the U.S., bringing the number of the people living below the poverty line to 46.20 million. This is an all time high in 52 years since a survey of the poor was made public in the country. 
					
					With that number on the steady increase, the poor numbered as many as 49.10 million as of early in November last year. 
					
					What is noticeable is the fact that the living of the middle class population deteriorated, joining the ranks of the poor. 
					
					It is the common view of the U.S. economists that it is the first time since the worldwide economic crisis from 1929 to 1933 that the average income of middle class families reached the lowest level. 
					
					The ever-deepening crisis of unemployment is leading to a vicious cycle of poverty. 
					
					According to data available, the number of the unemployed who remained without any job for more than one year is 4.5 million or almost one third of all the unemployed. 
					
					Young people, in particular, are hard hit by joblessness. 
					
					The U.S. is now witnessing ceaseless strong protest of people from all walks of life against the corrupt society bringing only poverty and inequality to the overwhelming majority of toiling masses and the misrule of the ruling class. 
					
					That is why the scream of despair that "a class struggle is going on" is now heard from the U.S. ruling quarters. Even the U.S. chief executive deplored that this is an expression of feelings of frustration about the American society.

articles.title: En Pyongyang director musical de orquesta sinfonica de Seul
articles.content:
En Pyongyang director musical de orquesta sinfonica de Seul
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Arribaron este martes a esta capital Jong Myong Hun, director musical de la Orquesta Sinfonica Municipal de Seul y de la Orquesta Philharmonic de Radio de Francia, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Presidente serbio ratifica posicion de desarrollar relaciones con RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente serbio ratifica posicion de desarrollar relaciones con RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Son Gyong presento el dia 21 ante el presidente de la Republica de Serbia, Boris Tadzic, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en ese pais. 
					En la ocasion el mandatario dijo que Serbia, pais heredero de ex Yugoslavia, aprecia las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la RPDC y mantiene la posicion de desarrollarlas mas en varios dominios como la politica y la economia. 
					
					Deseo que marchen bien todos los trabajos en la RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos y Japon acordaron trasladar la infanteria de marina norteamericana estacionada  en Okinawa a la isla Guam antes de trasladar la base de las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas en Fudenma a otro lugar del mismo departamento.
					Ademas, el imperio publico hace unos dias que dispersara de modo circular su infanteria de marina en Australia, Filipinas y otras regiones del Asia-Pacifico.
					
					De tal manera, EE.UU. demostro abiertamente su ambicion de dominar militarmente la citada region, senala asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					Para tomar la heguemonia mundial es necesario apoderarse de la region del Asia-Pacifico, esto se ha hecho la consigna principal de EE.UU. en realizar la estrategia de dominar al mundo.
					
					En esta region se encuentran unos paises dotados del considerable poderio politico, economico y militar, que puedan hacer anicos en un momento oportuno la estructura de unipolarizacion mundial encabezada por EE.UU.
					
					En este sentido, para EE.UU. es una demanda mas primordial y vital resistir por completo a los paises desafiadores a su estrategia de hegemonia mundial y apoderarse de la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					La estrategia de dominar a la region del Asia- Pacifico es, en su esencia, la de dominacion militar a Nordeste asiatico.
					
					En esta region en que se encuentran los puntos mas candentes en el mundo y el delicado problema territorial entre los paises regionales, el movimiento para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas combativas de las tropas norteamericanas trae una tormenta de la carrera armamentista y la exacerbacion de la situacion. Esto es una locura militar muy peligrosa que causa en esta region solo la guerra y la destruccion irrecuperable de la estabilidad social.
					
					EE.UU. debe darse clara cuenta de las consecuencias que emanen de su conducta militar y poner inmediato fin a sus maniobras de aumento de sus fuerzas combativas en la region de Asia-Pacifico.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica disparates de Ryu U Ik
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica disparates de Ryu U Ik
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el ministro surcoreano de Reunificacion, Ryu U Ik califico nuestra posicion de principios de "calumnia" y "violacion" diciendo que "es lamentable e impaciente" por no haber recibido la "respuesta" del Norte a su propuesta.
					Esto es una astuta artimana para imputarnos la responsabilidad de la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas, justificar la politica conflictiva y ocultar la naturaleza anti-reunificacion.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					Aunque actuan con dos caras y de manera astuta, las autoridades surcoreanas nunca pueden encubrir la naturaleza maligna como destructor del dialogo y estorbador del trabajo humanitario.
					
					Ahora se torna cada dia mas furiosa la indignacion de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea contra la banda conservadora titere que interrumpio las relaciones intercoreanas y exacerba la confrontacion.
					
					Para encubrir su naturaleza de maniacos conflictivos, la banda traidora finge tener interes en la mejora de las relaciones N-S.
					
					Pero, esto no pasa de ser esfuerzo desesperado. El destino de la banda traidora ya entro en el camino pendiente junto con la ruina de la politica conflictiva.
					
					Es demasiado grande el crimen cometido por las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela peligrosidad de estrategia de defensa de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela peligrosidad de estrategia de defensa de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos publico el informe de nueva estrategia de defensa nacional, cuyo contenido principal es reducir en gran medida los gastos militares durante un decenio, trasladar las fuerzas armadas norteamericanas en Europa y Medio Oriente a la region de Asia-Pacifico y arreglar la anterior estrategia militar para ejecutar dos guerras simultaneamente como la de cumplimiento de una sola guerra. En ese documento, esta anotado que se cumplira como previsto el plan de envio de mas de 690 mil uniformados norteamericanos de refuerzo en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana segun "OPLAN 5027". 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual de este martes, califica la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional de EE.UU. de la de agresion y guerra para realizar su insaciable ambicion de dominar el mundo. 
					
					El informe de la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional refleja la politica norteamericana de dominar, subyugar y agredir a otras naciones y constituye el texto de declaracion de guerra, senala el articulo y prosigue: 
					
					Su caracter reaccionario y peligrosidad reside en que EE.UU. politizo el mantenimiento de la estrategia nuclear como factor fundamental para la supremacia mundial y fijo la region de Asia-Pacifico como escenario principal de las operaciones militares en ultramar. 
					
					Ya que fracasa repetidamente su intento de unipolarizar el mundo, EE.UU. pretende cumplirlo con armas nucleares. 
					
					Las "provocaciones" y la "cohibicion" aludidas por el imperio no pasan de ser una artimana para mantener y fortalecer sus fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que EE.UU. intenta provocar la segunda guerra coreana, o sea, la nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Para tomar el control sobre Asia, es necesario apoderarse de Corea y de esta manera, se puede implementar facilmente las estrategias sobre Asia y el resto del mundo, esto es el calculo estrategico de EE.UU. 
					
					La guerra nuclear que se desate en la Peninsula Coreana se extendera facilmente a otros paises.
